scenes.description: MC segment with hololive members concluding the countdown celebration.
A skit segment featuring Shirakami Fubuki, Hakui Koyori, and La+ Darknesss preparing for the New Year toast.
Sakura Miko and Inugami Korone riding in a taxi after their live performance.
Shirakami Fubuki and La+ Darknesss chase after Miko and Korone's taxi.
A high-speed car chase sequence through the city streets.
Miko and Korone apologize for their prank after their car crashes at the venue.
All hololive members gather for the final countdown to the New Year.
MC section celebrating the New Year and introducing the special stage.
Transition sequence to the Coca-Cola special stage.
Coca-Cola Special Stage performance of 'Prism Melody'.

subtitles.original: みんな、コークは持ったかな？
subtitles.english: Everyone, do you have your Cokes?

subtitles.original: 準備した！乾杯するー！
subtitles.english: I'm ready! Let's toast!

subtitles.original: こらこら早いよラプちゃん。
subtitles.english: Hey now, too early, Lapu-chan.

subtitles.original: 避けるな！当たる！
subtitles.english: Don't dodge! It'll hit!

subtitles.original: 年越しのタイミングで、みんなで乾杯ってするんだよ。
subtitles.english: We're all going to toast together at the turn of the year.

subtitles.original: やだやだ、もう喉カラカラ。
subtitles.english: No, no, my throat is already parched.

subtitles.original: 楽しみだね。
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、みこさん。みこさん？
subtitles.english: Right, Miko-san? Miko-san?

subtitles.original: いやー、いいライブだったねー。
subtitles.english: Wow, that was a great live show.

subtitles.original: おつかれー。イェーイ。
subtitles.english: Good job. Yay.

subtitles.original: この後どうする？ご飯食べる？
subtitles.english: What should we do now? Want to eat?

subtitles.original: いやー、どこも混んでんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Well, everywhere's probably crowded, right?

subtitles.original: 確かに。もう帰りますかね。
subtitles.english: True. Should we just head home?

subtitles.original: あ、運転手さん、まっすぐね。
subtitles.english: Oh, driver, go straight, please.

subtitles.original: お、お。
subtitles.english: Oh, oh.

subtitles.original: おい！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: お前ら！何帰ってんだ！
subtitles.english: You guys! Why are you going home?!

subtitles.original: 乾杯！乾杯！
subtitles.english: Cheers! Cheers!

subtitles.original: フブちゃんたちがついてきてる。
subtitles.english: Fubu-chan and the others are following us.

subtitles.original: おろおろ、フブスも寂しくなっちゃったのかねぇ。
subtitles.english: Oh dear, maybe Fubusu got lonely too.

subtitles.original: 待てー！
subtitles.english: Wait!

subtitles.original: なんか怒ってない？
subtitles.english: Don't they seem kind of angry?

subtitles.original: おえ？あ、やばい。あのいたずらバレたかな？
subtitles.english: Eh? Oh no. Did they find out about that prank?

subtitles.original: あはは。やりすぎだったかなぁ。
subtitles.english: Ahaha. Maybe we went too far.

subtitles.original: やばいかも。運転手さん、ごめん。
subtitles.english: This might be bad. Driver, sorry.

subtitles.original: うおおおー！
subtitles.english: Waaaaagh!

subtitles.original: みこのドラテクで逃げるぞ！
subtitles.english: I'll escape with my driving techniques!

subtitles.original: うわー！うわー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Whoa!

subtitles.original: あ、来た。
subtitles.english: Ah, they're here.

subtitles.original: おおー。
subtitles.english: Whoa.

subtitles.original: すごいすごい！
subtitles.english: Amazing, amazing!

subtitles.original: うおー！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: フブちゃんごめんて、もういたずらしないから。
subtitles.english: I'm sorry Fubu-chan, I won't play pranks anymore.

subtitles.original: だめだよみこみこ、反省しなさい。
subtitles.english: No good, MikoMiko, reflect on what you've done.

subtitles.original: お前も共犯だろうが！
subtitles.english: You were an accomplice too!

subtitles.original: 何の話だ。おい。
subtitles.english: What are you talking about? Hey.

subtitles.original: 二人ともこれ持って。
subtitles.english: Both of you, take this.

subtitles.original: 何するの？
subtitles.english: What are we doing?

subtitles.original: もうすぐ新年だよ。
subtitles.english: It's almost the New Year.

subtitles.original: おおー！
subtitles.english: Ohhh!

subtitles.original: 乾杯ー！
subtitles.english: Cheers!

subtitles.original: あけましておめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: 今年もよろしくね。
subtitles.english: Happy New Year to you too.

subtitles.original: うわぁ！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: 最高の一杯！
subtitles.english: The best drink ever!

subtitles.original: そういえば、いたずらって何なの？
subtitles.english: By the way, what was the prank?

subtitles.original: あ、それね。
subtitles.english: Oh, that.

subtitles.original: フブさんのへそ、増やしたんだよ。
subtitles.english: We multiplied Fubu-san's belly buttons.

subtitles.original: 恐怖！
subtitles.english: Terrifying!

subtitles.original: この後は、コカ・コーラと一緒に、スペシャルライブステージ！
subtitles.english: Next up, a special live stage with Coca-Cola!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: SPECIAL STAGE
subtitles.english: SPECIAL STAGE

subtitles.original: 澄ますずっと僕らの奇跡が
subtitles.english: I'll listen closely so our miracle

subtitles.original: 途切れないように歌うんだ　もっと高く大きな声で
subtitles.english: will never cease, singing with an even louder, higher voice

subtitles.original: Prism Melody
subtitles.english: Prism Melody

subtitles.original: Words, Music, Arrangement: 5u5h1
subtitles.english: Words, Music, Arrangement: 5u5h1

subtitles.original: 聞こえてた　何かが始まるサイン",
subtitles.english: I heard it, the sign that something is starting

subtitles.original: 集まって気付けば　鼓動奏でた
subtitles.english: We gathered, and before I knew it, our heartbeats were in sync

subtitles.original: 夢に見るだけじゃもう　足りないでしょう？
subtitles.english: Just dreaming isn't enough anymore, is it?

subtitles.original: 君を待ってる世界があるよ
subtitles.english: There's a world out there waiting for you

subtitles.original: 楽しい予感にほら　飛び込んじゃえばいい
subtitles.english: Just dive into that feeling of excitement

subtitles.original: ときめきは止められないから
subtitles.english: Because this heart-pounding feeling can't be stopped

subtitles.original: 走ろう
subtitles.english: Let's run

subtitles.original: 連れて行くよ光の真ん中　夢の先へ羽ばたける
subtitles.english: I'll take you to the center of the light, we can soar beyond our dreams

subtitles.original: 勇気は君の願い　みんなで繋いだこの奇跡が
subtitles.english: Courage is your wish, and this miracle we've linked together

subtitles.original: 途切れないように歌うんだ　もっと高く大きな声で
subtitles.english: will never cease, singing with an even louder, higher voice

subtitles.original: 答えとか理屈に惑わされて
subtitles.english: Confused by answers and logic

subtitles.original: 彷徨っても戻ってこれる場所があった
subtitles.english: Even if I wandered, there was a place I could return to

subtitles.original: 自由に行き交う僕らは旅人
subtitles.english: We are travelers, moving freely back and forth

subtitles.original: 願いだけが道標だよ
subtitles.english: Only our wishes are our guideposts

subtitles.original: 夢の色が変わっても　変わらないメロディ
subtitles.english: Even if the colors of our dreams change, the melody remains the same

subtitles.original: 君のために　僕らのために
subtitles.english: For you, for us

subtitles.original: 歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's sing

subtitles.original: そうさきっと僕らの奇跡は　終わらないよ
subtitles.english: That's right, our miracle will surely never end

subtitles.original: 涙さえきっかけに変えていこう
subtitles.english: Let's turn even our tears into opportunities

subtitles.original: 信じてくれる仲間と一緒に
subtitles.english: Together with friends who believe in me

subtitles.original: どこへだって飛び出していこう　もっと遠く空へ
subtitles.english: Let's leap out into the world, even further into the sky
